title: Plant and Animal Life Cycles

vocab.kid_friendly_definition: The stages a living thing goes through from birth to death.
A big change in body form as an animal grows, like a caterpillar becoming a butterfly.
When pollen moves from one flower to another so seeds can form.
When a seed starts to sprout and grow into a new plant.
The tiny baby plant inside a seed or the early stage of an animal before birth.

teachingNotes: Use real plants and pictures of animal life cycles. Plant seeds in class. Focus on basic stages and vocabulary.

sample.question: Name the stage after seed in a plant's life cycle.
What is a big change some insects go through called?
What is the butterfly's 'resting' changing stage called?
What do adult plants often make to grow new plants?
What do baby animals grow into?
Name one animal that has metamorphosis.

truefalse.question: All living things have a life cycle.
A seedling is a baby plant.
Metamorphosis is when a plant makes seeds.
A frog does not change shape as it grows.
Adult animals can usually have babies.
A chrysalis is another word for pupa in butterflies.
Plants do not have life cycles.

multiplechoice.question: What comes after a seed in a plant's life cycle?
Which shows a correct order for a butterfly?
Which is NOT a plant life cycle part?
A tadpole grows legs and becomes a frog. This is called:
Which stage comes before adult in many animals?

fillintheblank.question: A butterfly starts as an _____, becomes a caterpillar, then a chrysalis, then an adult _____.
A young plant is called a _____.
The process when a seed starts growing is called _____.
A frog begins life as a _____.
Adult plants make _____ to start new plants.
A chrysalis is the _____ stage in butterflies.
A life cycle shows how living things _____ and change.

shortanswer.question: How are plant and animal life cycles similar?
expectedAny: both start small and become adults

shortanswer.question: Name the stages of a butterfly's life.
expectedAny: egg then caterpillar then cocoon then butterfly

shortanswer.question: What does a seed need to start growing?
How does a tadpole change as it becomes a frog?
expectedAny: body changes to live on land

shortanswer.question: Give an example of an animal that does not have metamorphosis.
What stage is a plant when it first grows leaves?
